title: Tsuihousaretara Nanya Kanya Moterutte Kiita
alternative_title: I Heard That If You Get Kicked Out, You Can Somehow Become Popular ; 追放されたらなんやかんやモテるって聞いた
status: I Heard That If You Get Kicked Out, You Can Somehow Become Popular ; 追放されたらなんやかんやモテるって聞いた

Description :
        A mage wants to be kicked out of his party so he can become popular like the trending trope.
